```{r , include = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

?mtcars

```


```{r setup, echo=FALSE}

cars <- read_csv("C:/Users/sreej/Desktop/Sorenson/Training/cars.csv")

names(cars)  #column headings

cars %>% 
  count(cyl)

cyltable <- cars %>% 
  count(cyl) %>% 
  print()

cars %>% 
  count(cyl, gear)

cars %>% 
  summarise(meanmpg = mean(mpg, na.rm = T))

cars %>% 
  group_by(cyl) %>% 
  summarise(meanmpg = mean(mpg, na.rm =T))

cars %>% 
  count(cyl) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=cyl, y=n))+
  geom_col()

cars %>% 
  count(cyl) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=cyl, y=n))+
  geom_abline()



cars %>% 
  count(cyl) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=cyl, y=n))+
  geom_col(fill="#741D5A")+
  labs(y="Number", x= "Cylinders")+
  ggtitle("Number of Cars by Cylinder")+
  theme_minimal()


```
